annotations.description: Today I'm celebrating Old Fashioned Week by making three of them without whiskey. Watch to learn more about my creative takes on the classic cocktail. ******...
annotations.title: Old Fashioned's New Twists | How to Drink

textContent:
three thin slices of lime
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Demerara Simple Syrup
2 Dashes ANGOSTURA aromatic bitters
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Rum

Add lime, syrup, and bitters to glass and muddle
Add a large ice cube and the rum
Stir up and enjoy

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zuj8AuVWKx4
title: Rum Old Fashioned
